name: HatLand
description:
HatLand is a game where you need to see GAME OVER many times to complete a level. But each time, passing further along the inner corridors of the Empire's spaceships, you will become stronger...

FEATURES:

— Melee and ranged enemy mechanics, allowing you to dodge and avoid taking damage at the right moment!
— Traps, mines, TNT - everything that you can turn at the right moment against opponents!
— A system of items and improvements, bundles of which will help you get to the next room.
— 9 unique bosses!
— 10 different types of enemies!
